ModMetaData.name: Eternal Youth Traits
ModMetaData.author: hamu-taro
ModMetaData.description:
Eternal Youth Traits MOD.1.3.0
Load Order - Core - HugsLib - Eternal Youth Traits
This mod is add new traits. - "Eternal youth" : does not age. - "Ammortal" : was never living. - "Immortal" : cannot die or age.
